questions.question_text:
Universal Containers has an active presence on Twitter and Facebook. Customers' requests from these social media channels should be responded to by support agents.
What should a consultant recommend to meet this requirement?

choices.C: Social Persona for Twitter and Facebook.
choices.A: Social Customer Service for Twitter and Facebook.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A is the answer

Selected Answer: A
Social personas is reserved for UX interactions in Salesforce https://trailhead.salesforce.com/content/learn/modules/ux-personas-for-salesforce/get_started_with_personas#:~:text=Salesforce%20personas%20are%20crafted%20through%20rigorous%20data%20collection,product%2C%20all%20within%20the%20context%20of%20their%20needs.

questions.question_text:
Support Managers have requested the ability to provide real-time feedback to Agents during customer chat sessions.
What feature should a consultant configure to meet this requirement?

discussion.content: Shouldn't that be the case feed?

comments.content: Case feed is not real-time, with the omni supervisor you can enter the chat with the agent and talk to him while talking to the customer.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Should be C. You don't enable keyboard shortcuts in Lightning, they are just there and you can't customise them.

However, you can control the visibility of components based on criteria.

comments.content:
You do enable keyboard shortcuts in lightning:
https://www.infallibletechie.com/2013/11/how-to-enable-console-keyboard.html?expand_article=1

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Bad question - But it must be C, assuming some architecture is included that would "reveal all" in case the conditions are somehow incorrect

chatgpt says C 
C. Define criteria-based record page components

Using criteria-based components can help declutter the interface by only displaying the features that are immediately relevant to the task at hand. This way, Service Representatives will only see the tabs and features they need for the specific case or situation they are currently working on, making the console less crowded and easier to navigate.

Selected Answer: B
Use keyboard shortcuts to work efficiently in Salesforce. Shortcuts help you navigate and work with records faster and without using your mouse. 

https://help.salesforce.com/s/articleView?id=sf.accessibility_keyboard_shortcuts.htm&type=5

Selected Answer: A
It has to be A. Question says "difficult to find the tabs and features"... users unable to find tabs would not be helped by record page components. It's not B since one cannot enable keyboard shortcuts. It's not D because they wouldn't help users find tabs and features

https://help.salesforce.com/s/articleView?id=sf.accessibility_keyboard_shortcuts.htm&type=5
Cannot be B as lightning keyboard shortcuts cant be customised

questions.question_text:
Service Representatives are complaining that the Lightning Service Console is too crowded making it difficult to find the tabs and features they need. After reviewing the Service Representatives console use, all configured features are required.
Which solution should a consultant suggest to improve the efficiency of console users?

Universal Containers (UC) receives partner data in Excel format. The Excel data is all text, but needs to be imported into existing Salesforce Date, Number, and Text fields.
Which three best practices should a consultant recommend? (Choose three.)

choices.C: Install the Data Quality Analysis Dashboards from the AppExchange.
choices.E: Import the records and create a workflow rule to change the data type.
choices.A: Deduplicate the data before importing into Salesforce.
choices.B: Import the records and use Duplicate Management.
choices.D: Standardize all rows to match Salesforce data types.

discussion.content:
A. Deduplicate the data before importing into Salesforce.
This is crucial to maintain data integrity. Eliminating duplicates before import helps in avoiding data clutter and ensures that you have a single source of truth within Salesforce.

D. Standardize all rows to match Salesforce data types.
Ensuring that the Excel data matches the Salesforce field types (Date, Number, Text etc.) before importing will prevent errors during the import process and ensure that data is accurately reflected in Salesforce.

B. Import the records and use Duplicate Management.
While it's important to deduplicate before importing, using Salesforce's Duplicate Management feature provides another layer of data integrity, ensuring that no duplicates are created during or after the import process.

Note that option E would be problematic because workflow rules are not designed to change data types, and option C might be useful but doesn't directly address the issue of data types or duplicates in this specific context.

(X) C. Install the Data Quality Analysis Dashboards from the AppExchange.
While useful for ongoing data quality monitoring, this step is not directly related to the initial import process of standardizing and deduplicating data.

Answer is A, C, and D. Duplicate Management is for maintaining data quality and preventing duplicates from being created. 
https://trailhead.salesforce.com/content/learn/modules/data_quality
https://help.salesforce.com/s/articleView?id=sf.data_quality.htm&type=5

questions.question_text:
The contact center at Universal Containers offers support through phone, email, public website, and an Experience Cloud site. The contact center manager wants to demonstrate the success of recent self-service initiatives to executive management.
Which two reports should the contact center manager present to executive management? (Choose two.)

choices.C: Number of cases created using the Experience Cloud site by month.
choices.D: Average call handle time by team.
choices.A: Number of Knowledge articles created each month.
choices.B: Number of cases closed by self-service users.

discussion.content:
it should be B,C.
Option A is relevant for tracking knowledge base content generation but does not directly measure the success of self-service initiatives in terms of case resolution or customer satisfaction.
Option D is important for monitoring the efficiency of call handling but is not directly related to measuring the success of self-service initiatives.

BC is right because number of articles is for the knowledge base metrics and D if anything the average call handling time will increase due to more complex cases coming through with customers being able to close the less complex ones by themselves

Selected Answer: BD
The keyword is 'to demonstrate the success of recent self-service initiatives. Answer should be BD

Selected Answer: AB
Shouldn't it be AB? How will report in option C help if cases can also come from phone and email.
